product_name: Marmot Mica Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ultralight waterproof, breathable Marmot Mica Rain Jacket for men adds only 7 oz. to your gear. You won't want to leave home without it. MemBrain(R) Strata(TM) ripstop nylon creates a soft, quiet and compressible shell that offers windproof, waterproof and breathable protection. 100% seam taped to keep weather out; adjustable hood, cuffs and hem add further protection. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow full range of arm motion and prevent jacket from rising up when arms are raised. Water-resistant front zipper; zippered hand pockets. Marmot Mica Rain Jacket for men features reflective logos and packs into its own zippered pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The ultralight waterproof, breathable Marmot Mica Rain Jacket for men adds only 7 oz. to your gear. You won't want to leave home without it.
